snippet: Canvases that consist of the day, month and year of its making, recorded in simple white sans-serif text on a solid background, make up many of the works on view in On Kawara’s show “Date Painting(s) in New York and 136 Other Cities,” at the...
abstract: Karen Rosenberg reviews paintings by On Kawara at David Zwirner Gallery.
lead_paragraph: Canvases that consist of the day, month and year of its making, recorded in simple white sans-serif text on a solid background, make up many of the works on view in On Kawara’s show “Date Painting(s) in New York and 136 Other Cities,” at the David Zwirner Gallery.

headline.seo: On Kawara’s ‘Date Painting(s)’ at David Zwirner Gallery
headline.main: On Kawara’s ‘Date Painting(s)’ at David Zwirner Gallery
headline.print_headline: On Kawara: ‘Date Painting(s) in New York and 136 Other Cities’
